localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Bowling on your Vita! Send your ball up the lane and knock down all of the pins across six different bowling alleys. Play alone, with a friend, or challenge the cpu to see who comes out on top.

Package size: 248 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1-2 Players

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright(C) 2014 James Collins

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
